name: Dorol
description: Dorol is a gold‑backed digital asset built on the Ethereum blockchain. Each token, labeled DRL, is backed by one troy ounce of 999.9‑fine investment-grade gold that is professionally vaulted and fully insured. The project's aim is to combine gold’s enduring store-of-value with the speed, accessibility, and composability of public blockchain infrastructure, enabling seamless trading, transfer, and redemption of tokenized physical gold
